vision.notes: Visual capabilities in Lauridae are currently unknown due to limited information.

mechanoreception.notes: As crustaceans, Lauridae likely possess mechanoreceptors for detecting water currents and vibrations. This is inferred from other crustacean families.

chemoreception.notes: Crustaceans generally rely on chemoreception for detecting chemical cues in their environment. This is inferred from other crustacean families.
